Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan has played 3 matches in the series and is currently in 5th place on the points table, while South Africa has also played 3 matches and is in 2nd place.
The match will be held at Sydney Cricket Ground (SCG), Sydney.
The pitch at SCG is balanced, offering assistance to both batsmen and bowlers.
In the last 32 matches at SCG, the average first innings score is 150 runs.
Pacers have been quite successful on this ground, suggesting a strategy to include more fast bowlers in the team.
In head-to-head encounters, Pakistan has won 11 matches while South Africa has won 10 matches.
